properties.areaDesc: West Elk and Sawatch Mountains; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 2:08PM MST until February 10 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches
with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph
this evening, then decreasing overnight.

* WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas, Gore and Elk
Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys and West Elk and Sawatch
Mountains.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of
the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM MST MONDAY
